entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:32 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:32 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
